answerText: The Stefan-Boltzmann law states that this quantity for a blackbody is proportional to the fourth power of the temperature.[10] power of the emitted radiation

question: Question: The assumption that every degree of freedom had to contribute one half k T to the energy of these things led to the ultraviolet catastrophe.  [10] Name these idealized objects which reflect no light and emit electromagnetic radiation with a continuous spectrum.
